about_the_game:
"Battle for the Void" is a 2D online computer game set in the farthest corners of space, where only pure energy and matter remain. In this bleak world, players can engage in real-time battles against each other in various network modes.

DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENT


The terrain in "Battle for the Void" is more than just a backdrop; it's a key component of gameplay. When players engage in combat, the environment will be destroyed by various weapons and attacks, creating caves and craters that can provide strategic advantages or be used against players. The landscape will regenerate and change, offering players new opportunities for maneuvering and combat.

FLYING OPTIONS


In "Battle for the Void", players can choose from three different space fighters, each with its own unique set of abilities and more than 15 types of weapons in their arsenal. Each fighter has its own development tree, to progress through which you need to earn energy, matter, and other in-game currency in PvP and PvE battles. In addition to the fighters' abilities, there is an artifact system in the game that can significantly affect game mechanics, from damage to technology research time!

ENEMIES


Players are not alone in this world. Strange creatures inhabit this unpredictable environment, living clusters of energy or matter that move and react in unexpected ways. These creatures can be either a hindrance or a help, adding a new level of complexity to an already complex gameplay. Additionally, some maps have special features and modes, such as volcanic eruptions, global darkness, and others.

GAME MODES


PvE Assault
Several classic scroll-shooter maps that need to be completed either alone or in a group, with a final boss fight at the end.

PvE Defense
Over the course of a match, you need to defend your base from several waves of space creatures. The battle is considered lost as soon as any creature penetrates the base's perimeter. This challenge can be accepted alone or in a team of up to 10 players.

Capture the Flag
Two teams of 2 to 6 players participate in a match. The task of each is to capture and transfer to their base the maximum number of flags that appear at different locations during the match time.

Defense and Capture
The match involves 2 teams of 2 to 4 people. In powerful PvP battles, you need to defend your base and try to capture the opponent's base. Teams' bases are located at different ends of the map, and to reach the enemy's base, all watchtowers along the way must be destroyed. The team that can first hold in the enemy's zone for more than one minute in full strength wins.

Free-for-All
Here, every man is for himself. The game is in complete chaos, the environment is constantly changing. Players rank and receive rewards depending on the number of points scored during the match time. Up to 8 players can fight on the map at the same time.

Last Hero
The mode is similar to Free-for-All, but the game goes on an elimination basis until the last survivor. Up to 12 players can participate simultaneously.

During the game, you will need quick reactions and strategic thinking. With a destructible world, mysterious creatures, customizable fighters, and a range of game modes, "Battle for the Void" is a serious test of your space fighter skills. So, are you ready to take the challenge and fight for dominance in the void?
